title: Welcome to The Ringer NFL Show
description:
'The Ringer NFL Show' is here for the offseason, previewing the 2021 season and reacting to the latest news. MON: Kevin Clark and Nora Princiotti WED: 'Flying Coach' Season 2 with Sean McVay and Peter Schrager For fantasy advice, follow 'The Ringer Fantasy Football Podcast.'
